author: Amazon Customer

review: When I was searching for video streaming, I was concerned that our network connection is sometimes spotty in quality.  I thought the buffering strategy of this unit would help smooth out those issues.  I can say we have never had a problem with poor quality video or lost connections.  I think the quality is better than I'm receiving for my HD channels on my satellite tv.  And, we so enjoy skipping commercials on the tv series.Amazon Prime has a wide selection of videos that are free.  Once you get used to how that is displayed (it says something like View Now with Amazon Prime -- meaning it's free), I'm sure you will find lots to watch there.  And the selection, including rentals, is excellent.

review: This is awesome!  I had trouble streaming with the Roku 3.  I've had NO trouble with the Amazon Fire TV!  It's easy to set-up and use, and the emote is great.  I only wish TV shows and movies were separate on my watch list.  Maybe this could be a software update?  Of course the voice search can help here too!  BTW I was able to sell on Amazon my Roku 3 for a good price!
